__NOTOC__ bool '''ReflectOffActor''' (Actor ''blocking'')
== Usage == Reflects the calling actor off the ''blocking'' actor. This is the same logic used for reflective projectiles, including accounting for flags like {{flag|AIMREFLECT}}, {{flag|SHIELDREFLECT}} etc, this is normally called from a projectile, as it also sets the ''blocking'' actor as the callers' target in the end, and changes the tracer pointer if the caller is a {{flag|SEEKERMISSILE}}.
=== Parameters === *''blocking'': The actor that the caller is reflecting off of.
=== Return value === Returns true if the caller successfully reflected off the ''blocking'' actor.False if the caller is not {{flag|REFLECTIVE}} at all.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
